About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a fullstack web developer currently doing Computer Science with just under 2 years experience building websites and web apps.

I mainly specialize in HTML, CSS, JS, NODE JS/EXPRESS, and MONGODB but I also dabble in a bit of PHP, MYSQL and WORDPRESS when needed. Reach out and let's create an awesome website.

Full Stack Website Developer

Whether it's front end development you're after or backend or even both, I'm your guy. I'll have your website not only looking great but functioning great as well.

SEO Specialist

On page seo, off page seo, backlinks, you name it, I got it covered. I'll have your website ranking well in google

Wordpress Developer

CMS design and development and I'll even guide you on how you can manage and maintain the simple things on your wordpress so you don't have to call a developer for every little thing.
